job_title: New College Grad - Global Quality Signal Integrity Qualification Engineer
job_description: • Experience with laboratory equipment for electrical measurements: Vector Network Analyzer (VNA) and oscilloscope at a minimum Familiarity with basic electronic circuits, semiconductor technology, and quality and reliability fundamentals The ability to work with tight schedules, to prioritize competing activities, and to travel when required Strong initiative and ability to think and act independently, along with good problem-solving skills Bachelor’s, or Master's degree in Electrical Engineering or a related field (Master’s preferred) Coursework or hands on experience in Electromagnetics, or RF measurements, or Signal Integrity Experience in Signal Integrity Engineering, electrical test and measurement, or related field Experience using MatLab or Python to fit and analyze complex data sets desired Experience with programming (Visual Basic, C++, Python, LabVIEW, or similar) Interface with internal and external customers.
